title: YouTube May Have Misinformation Blind Spots, Researchers Say
description: The video platform said it had limited the spread of misinformation ahead of Election Day, but new research showed that false narratives continued to slip through.

title: Fed Up With Political Text Messages? Read On.
description: In this polarized climate, hundreds of Americans told us they agree on one thing: Campaigns must stop spamming voters’ phones with unwanted political texts.
